mapper.update: update TELECTIVE set STATUS = 1 where USERID=#{USERID} And STATUS = 0
mapper.select: select * From TELECTIVE Where 1=1 And USERID=#{USERID} And STATUS = 0
select * From TLESSON Where 1=1 And ID In (Select LESSONID From TELECTIVELESSON Where ELECTIVEID In (Select ELECTIVEID From TSEMESTERELECTIVE Where SEMESTERID = #{SEMESTERID}))
select DATE From TTEACHERTIME Where 1=1 And ID In (Select TIMEID From TELECTIVELESSON Where ELECTIVEID In (Select ELECTIVEID From TSEMESTERELECTIVE Where SEMESTERID = #{SEMESTERID})) Group By DATE

select a.*,b.*,c.*,(Select NAME From TBUSER Where ID=c.USERID) USERNAME,(Select NAME From TCURRICULUM Where ID=(Select CURRICULUMID From TELECTIVE Where ID = a.ELECTIVEID)) CURRICULUMNAME From TELECTIVELESSON a join TLESSON b on a.LESSONID = b.id join TTEACHERTIME c on a.TIMEID=c.ID Where a.ELECTIVEID In (Select ELECTIVEID From TSEMESTERELECTIVE Where SEMESTERID = #{SEMESTERID})

select *,(Select NAME From TBUSER Where ID=a.USERID) USERNAME , (Select FORMAT(count(*)/2,1) From TELECTIVELESSON Where ELECTIVEID In (Select ELECTIVEID From TSEMESTERELECTIVE Where SEMESTERID = a.ID)) MUCHLESSON, (Select min(DATE) From TTEACHERTIME Where ID In (Select TIMEID From TELECTIVELESSON Where ELECTIVEID In (Select ELECTIVEID From TSEMESTERELECTIVE Where SEMESTERID = a.ID))) FIRST, (Select max(DATE) From TTEACHERTIME Where ID In (Select TIMEID From TELECTIVELESSON Where ELECTIVEID In (Select ELECTIVEID From TSEMESTERELECTIVE Where SEMESTERID = a.ID))) LATEST From TSEMESTER a Where ID = #{SEMESTERID} limit 0,1
select * From TTEACHERTIME Where 1=1 And DATE >= #{today} And USERID In (Select USERID From TUSERCURRICULUM Where CURRICULUMID = #{ID}) Group By DATE

select *,(Select NAME From TBUSER Where ID=USERID) USERNAME From TTEACHERTIME Where 1=1 And DATE >= #{today} And USERID In (Select USERID From TUSERCURRICULUM Where CURRICULUMID = #{ID}) Order By DATE
